alert.note: Alert for Surry; Wilkes; Yadkin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 3:47PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Surry, northeastern Wilkes and northwestern Yadkin Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 347 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Benham, or near Elkin, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elkin... Jonesville... Ronda... Mountain Park... Pleasant Hill... State Road... and Benham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
